name: Spell Adventures
description:
Spell Adventure is the story of a magician runing in the hills to find his destiny. He'll meet monsters that he needs to defeat with his magical powers.

This is a school project done in groups

Project Chief - Moeva Mondoha
Programmation - Meµ
Level Design - Thierry Cecci
Graphs - Axel de Conti
VFX - Kellian Jadeau
SFX & Music - Gaspard Brousseau
